opinion.posture: Indictment charging defendant with receiving stolen property. Before PORTER, J. Verdict of guilty and judgment of sentence entered. Defendant appealed. Appeal, No. 887, Oct. T., 1978, from Court of Common Pleas, Trial Division, of Philadelphia, No. 7704-787. Argued September 12, 1978.
opinion.attorneys: Robert F. Weiner, for appellant; V. Fortuno, Assistant District Attorney, with him Edward G. Rendell, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
opinion.panel: Before PRICE, HESTER and HOFFMAN, JJ.
